attributes.action: stop new taxes we pay to much now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
each and every year we see more and more new taxes. these all take from the wages we get.
we call all the new taxes green but if you look at it from the other side all the cash is not spent on green issues. if we have a green tax then lets spend it only on green issues.
year after year our taxes go up and what we are given goes down and down. at the bottem end of the wage bill the poor and not so well off get a pay rise of about 2 to 4 percent but our tax bills and new taxes go up by about 7 percent so every year you are worse off than the year before

its time to place this tax on the people with big salerys and companys that make over 10.000.000.00 million in proffet make them cut thair proffit to help people i hate to here a company has made 46 billion proffet that could run several hospitals or schools ect
